name: Shocking Information (V)
Lore: '''R2-D2, you know better than to trust a strange computer.''',
Text: 'Unless you have a senate majority, if opponent just took a character into hand from Reserve Deck, deployed a character from Reserve Deck (except with an Effect with ''matching'' in game text), or just drew a card from Reserve Deck using a character''s game text, they must place 2 other cards from hand on Used Pile (if possible).',
